alert.note: Alert for Madison; Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 10:38AM EST until February 19 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southeastern Oneida County in central New York... East central Madison County in central New York... * Until 1130 AM EST. * At 1038 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Floyd to Georgetown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Utica, Rome, Kirkland, Westmoreland, Paris, Deerfield, Whitesboro, New York Mills, Yorkville and Augusta. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 31 and 32. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
